channel.title: [Delta]PKing Same IP[317]
channel.description: How do I prevent people from attacking each other from the same IP?

item.title: [Delta]PKing Same IP[317]
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Lol, I added it into the right location. I had to change it to this: [code] if(connectedFrom.equalsIgnoreCase(AttackingOn2.connectedFrom)
|| AttackingOn2.connectedFrom.equalsIgnoreCase(connectedFrom)) {
sM(“Same IP, you may not attack.”);

							break;[/code]  My power went out, so sorry for long reply.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta]PKing Same IP[317]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:6, topic:380840”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=476665.msg3486244#msg3486244 date=1296598291]

if(connectedFrom == AttackingOn2.connectedFrom){ sM("You can't attack players from your IP address."); AttackingOn2.sM("You cannot be attacked by players from your IP address."); break; }

No reason why this shouldn’t work.
[/quote]
He’s obviously not adding it in the right location :/[/quote]

True

Read full topic

item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

if(connectedFrom == AttackingOn2.connectedFrom){ sM("You can't attack players from your IP address."); AttackingOn2.sM("You cannot be attacked by players from your IP address."); break; }

item.title: [Delta]PKing Same IP[317]
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

[quote=“Oh-Noes, post:2, topic:380840”]Find:

case 73: (Attack players packet)

And underneath:

AttackingOn = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];
Add:

if(AttackingOn2.playerLastConnect == playerLastConnect) { sM("You can't attack players from your IP address."); break; }[/quote]
Thanks! Awww didn’t work. :’(

[quote=“relmitos, post:3, topic:380840”]Add something like if (this.connectedFrom != targetPlayer.connectedFrom) continue;
in the attack player packet. Which is 73 or 75 if I’m not mistaken.

Edit. Oh Noes I was too late. hehe[/quote]
This worked, I had to edit it a bit though. It didn’t work. :’(

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta]PKing Same IP[317]
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Add something like if (this.connectedFrom != targetPlayer.connectedFrom) continue;
in the attack player packet. Which is 73 or 75 if I’m not mistaken.

Edit. Oh Noes I was too late. hehe

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta]PKing Same IP[317]
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

Find:

case 73: (Attack players packet)

And underneath:

AttackingOn = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];
Add:

if(AttackingOn2.playerLastConnect == playerLastConnect) { sM("You can't attack players from your IP address."); break; }

Read full topic
